__TOC__

 Bluetooth networking is when 2+ devices are connected via the transfer protocol Bluetooth. Bluetooth is a short range transfer protocol that can send files at a resonably fast rate. It is used for short range file transfer applications, some of which are: cell phone to cell phone, cell phone to printer, cell phone to computer, cell phone to headset, and many others....
